import React, { Component } from 'react';
import { render } from 'react-dom';
import {
  PhaseCard,
  PhaseCardHeading,
  PhaseCardSubheading,
  PhaseCardDetail,
  PhaseCardDetailList,
  PhaseCardDescription,
  PhaseCardText,
  PhaseCardWhen,
  Expander,
  ExpanderButton,
  ExpanderIcon,
  ExpanderBody,
  ExpanderWhen,
  Skeleton,
  Whenable,
} from '../components';
 
import './main.scss';
 
const phaseStateIconMap = {
  complete: 'fa fa-check',
  critical: 'fa fa-exclamation-triangle',
  warn: 'fa fa-exclamation-circle',
  open: 'fa fa-info-circle',
  pending: 'fa fa-info-circle',
};
 
class App extends Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
 
    this.state = {
      isReady: false,
    };
  }
 
  componentDidMount() {
    setTimeout(() => this.setState({ isReady: true }) , 5000);
  }
 
  render() {
    return (
      ['complete', 'critical', 'warn', 'open', 'pending'].map((phaseState) => (
        <PhaseCard key={phaseState} phaseState={phaseState} phaseStateIconMap={phaseStateIconMap}>
          <PhaseCardHeading>
            <Whenable condition={this.state.isReady}>
              Claim Number#: 1234567890
            </Whenable>
            <Whenable condition={!this.state.isReady}>
              <Skeleton className="skeleton-text-sm"/>
            </Whenable>
          </PhaseCardHeading>
          <PhaseCardWhen phaseConditions="*">
            <PhaseCardDetailList>
              <PhaseCardDetail>
                <PhaseCardSubheading>Claim Type</PhaseCardSubheading>
                <PhaseCardText>
                  <Whenable condition={this.state.isReady}>
                    Theft
                  </Whenable>
                  <Whenable condition={!this.state.isReady}>
                    <Skeleton className="skeleton-text-sm"/>
                  </Whenable>
                </PhaseCardText>
              </PhaseCardDetail>
              <PhaseCardDetail>
                <PhaseCardSubheading>Standard Deduction</PhaseCardSubheading>
                <PhaseCardText>
                  <Whenable condition={this.state.isReady}>
                    $500
                  </Whenable>
                  <Whenable condition={!this.state.isReady}>
                    <Skeleton className="skeleton-text-sm"/>
                  </Whenable>
                </PhaseCardText>
              </PhaseCardDetail>
              <PhaseCardDetail>
                <PhaseCardSubheading>Date Filed</PhaseCardSubheading>
                <PhaseCardText>
                  <Whenable condition={this.state.isReady}>
                    11/12/2017
                  </Whenable>
                  <Whenable condition={!this.state.isReady}>
                    <Skeleton className="skeleton-text-sm"/>
                  </Whenable>
                </PhaseCardText>
              </PhaseCardDetail>
            </PhaseCardDetailList>
            <PhaseCardDescription>
              <PhaseCardSubheading>Description</PhaseCardSubheading>
              <PhaseCardText>
                <Whenable condition={this.state.isReady}>
                  Bicycle stolen from outside a restaurant.
                </Whenable>
                <Whenable condition={!this.state.isReady}>
                  <Skeleton className="skeleton-text-sm"/>
                </Whenable>
              </PhaseCardText>
            </PhaseCardDescription>
            <Expander>
              <ExpanderBody>
                <PhaseCardDescription>This is a test</PhaseCardDescription>
                <PhaseCardDescription>This of some</PhaseCardDescription>
                <PhaseCardDescription>More content</PhaseCardDescription>
                <PhaseCardDescription>This is a test</PhaseCardDescription>
                <PhaseCardDescription>Only a test</PhaseCardDescription>
              </ExpanderBody>
              <ExpanderButton>
                <ExpanderWhen showExpanded={false}>See More</ExpanderWhen>
                <ExpanderWhen showCollapse={false}>See Less</ExpanderWhen>
                <ExpanderIcon
                  className="fa"
                  classNameExpanded="fa-chevron-up"
                  classNameCollapsed="fa-chevron-down"
                />
              </ExpanderButton>
            </Expander>
          </PhaseCardWhen>
        </PhaseCard>
      ))
    );
  }
}
 
render(<App />, document.getElementById('app'));
